messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM LEE GONZALEZ
messages.content: WHY WE NEED CHANGE IN BRITAIN TODAY

messages.title: CAN YOU STOMACH A 4TH LABOUR TERM?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lee Gonzalez and Conservatives believe it's time for a change to break away from the dead hand of state and break the shackles that hold back growth.
The Conservatives have pledged that all frontline services will not have budgets cuts and will increase spending every year for the NHS.
Lee Gonzalez wants to lead legislation to overhaul the national curriculum, release teachers from bureaucracy, improve discipline, and make exams more rigorous.

issues.economy: We need to change if we are going to improve our future. Voters have to ask themselves, are we happy with the current state of Pontypridd? Have we had a good deal under the Labour government?
issues.health: Welsh Assembly Government statistics show NHS services have deteriorated. How will a Conservative Government improve these?

housing.content: Lee opposes the RCT Council cuts to leisure facilities in Pontypridd.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Comments on Labour's actions such as visiting the bypass construction at Church Village and new labour cuts at Church Village and a massive reduction from the original carriage way previously planned.
